alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 4:33AM EST until December 19 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Piscataquis River At Medford affecting Penobscot and Piscataquis Counties. Penobscot River At West Enfield affecting Penobscot County. Penobscot River At Eddington affecting Penobscot County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... East Branch Penobscot River At Grindstone affecting Penobscot County. For the Piscataquis River...including Abbot Climate Station, Medford...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Penobscot River...including Mattawamkeag, Grindstone, West Enfield, Eddington, Bangor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Branch Penobscot River at Grindstone. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, State Route 11 flooded in places. Homes and camps threatened. Significant flooding of Penobscot River Trails. Moderate backwater flooding of Mud & Hay Brooks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.7 feet. - River is out of its banks. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.0 feet on 03/20/1936. - For flood safety visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon at 445 PM EST.
